ygData.subject: A response from Zardoz, "the Supreme High Elven Mage"
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes Itan, I can imagne you have a lot of work to be done: mostly in striving to get even the most meager grasp of the Arcane Arts, which I, the Great Zardoz,
ygData.messageBody:
Yes Itan, I can imagne you have a lot of work to be done: mostly in
striving to get even the most meager grasp of the Arcane Arts, which I,
the Great Zardoz, am most supreme at using! Hah!

OOC: anyone got a clue as to how to get from the wood elves tree city to
the city of the dwarves?


----Original Message Follows----
From: silten@...
Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] FAO Zardoz. A response from Itan the Whistler
Date: 4 Apr 1999 12:32:37 -0000

From: silten@...

Zardoz you weak minded fool!

I accept without arguement that High Elves have been around a while,
butthen, so have the Giants. Age is no guarantee of intellect. Face it
Elf, Erud and all his followers have perfected the art of magic to a
degree that you can simply never achieve.

We are more intelligent than you, get over it.

It is good to see, however, that even less intelligent people like
yourself can see the necros for what they are. They should all be
rounded up and burned in the eternal fire of Solusek's wrath. Perhaps
you would like to help gather wood for the pyre?

Enough idle chatter, I have work to be done.

Your Superior,

Itan the Whistler.
